duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive sales and exceed sales goals, by leading and motivating the team.
Maintain brand loyalty with every customer interaction and promote campaigns to drive brand awareness.
Execute and innovate daily operational procedures, support the team in maintaining visual standards, and ensure an organized and inviting store environment.
Uphold company policies and procedures, and ensure reliability and integrity.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field (optional)
